## transitland rt-convert

Convert GTFS-RealTime to JSON

### Synopsis

Convert GTFS-RealTime to JSON



```
transitland rt-convert [flags] <input pb>
```

### Examples

```
% transitland rt-convert "trips.pb"
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help         help for rt-convert
  -o, --out string   Write JSON to file; defaults to stdout
```
